author: Trey Alston
title: Rotimi Says ‘In My Bed’ Will Be Responsible For Many Post-Quarantine Babies
description: Rotimi's 'In My Bed' has become a fitting song during the work-from-home-during-quarantine era. He told MTV News about his new EP, 'Unplugged Sessions,' and more.
content: Rotimis In My Bed has a couple different meanings. As he sings, theres a meeting in his bedroom specifically in his bed so during quarantine, this could mean something innocent, like hes on a Zoom daily check-in. Or it could mean something a little more provo… [+4858 chars]
